description: Conveniently located just 2 stops into Manhattan, 20 minutes to Times Square and 4 blocks away from the N/Q/W + 7 Trains. Lots of light with large window and very comfy pillow top Queen bed. One bedroom apartment +leather couch + air mattress + 2 large TV's w/Apple TV + Amazon Fire + Amazing speakers, fast wifi, desk space, custom-built furniture and large leather couch. All kitchen and bathroom needs are available, laundry in building.  Early 1st floor access (no stairs). You will love my home!
name: Cute 1 Bdrm Apt, 10 minutes from Manhattan
review: The host canceled this reservation 70 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
